sources.title: Lifezone secures licence for Kabanga nickel project in Tanzania
sources.snippet: The Tanzanian Government has awarded Lifezone Metals a licence to operate a multi-metal processing facility for nickel, copper and cobalt at its Kabanga Nickel Project in Kahama.
